MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the G73 postcode area of Rutherglen. This is causing flickering supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.28pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional fault finding investigations being required and our team are now working to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:09pm on Wednesday, 13 January 2021
